Bioelements Recovery Serum

Brand: BioElements

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Cocoate, Dimethiconol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ceramide 3, Sphingolipids, Dioctyl Succinate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Lavandula Hybrida (Lavandin) Oil, Squalane

Directions: AM: After cleansing and toning, apply a thin layer on clean, dry skin. Follow with a Bioelements moisturizer or broad spectrum sunscreen. PM: After cleansing and toning, apply a thin layer and follow with a Bioelements moisturizer or nighttime treatment creme. Rub excess into cuticles to condition and soften. Add a small amount to hair

PM: After cleansing and toning, apply a thin layer and follow with a Bioelements moisturizer or nighttime treatment creme. Rub excess into cuticles to condition and soften. Add a small amount to hair to add sleek shine.
